it.polimi.se2018.strategy.objective

Class Shades

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.strategy.objective.Shades
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScorePointStrategy

    public class Shades
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScorePointStrategy
    These cards allow you to score points every time you have a set of light (1, 2), medium (3, 4) or dark (5, 6) shades on your window pattern card

      int scorePoint(WindowPatternCard windowPatternCard)
      For every set of light, medium or dark shades found, this method adds 2 points
